name: XenoRelics - White Rider No2
description:
Vision of an Artefact from an Alien world…
3722x3741
Grab one of these White RideNo2 limited collectibles and own a slice of history before I reveal the secret project I am working on for a while that is connected to this series.

There are stories of Atlantean people who did not need telescopes and spaceships to discover distant worlds. They used a so-called Star Meditation for envisioning those far places.
This painting was made with a similar procedure only my visions are manifesting in the artwork. 

The White RiderNo2 is a digital version of the original Oil painting. It's an important part of the Xenorelics series which is a part of my lifelong Art program that I have learned from my master Sandor Molnar a brilliant mind who invented and created a new approach to spiritual growth for artists, called Painter Yoga. It's a unique implementation of ancient Occult teachings into the modern life of an artist.

Claim your Xenorelics White RiderNo2 limited edition NFT collectible now.
